xxl.core.relational.metaData

Interface ExtendedColumnMetaData

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ColumnMetaData
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ColumnMetaInfo

    public interface ExtendedColumnMetaData
extends ColumnMetaData
    An object that provides information about a single columns of a given table. This extension to standard ColumnMetaData also provides the method getColumnCharacterCount() method which returns the maximum length for a string entry if this column is a string typed column. Please mark, that ExtendedColumnMetaData stores a single column whereas ExtendedResultSetMetaData is designed to hold a bundle of columns..
    See Also:
    ResultSetMetaData, ExtendedResultSetMetaData

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getMaxContainingStringLength()
      Gets the maximum character length for a string value entry if this column is declared as a string typed one.
      void setMaxContainingStringLength(int length)
      Sets the maximum character length for a string value entry if this column is declared as a string typed one.

      • Methods inherited from interface xxl.core.relational.metaData.ColumnMetaData

        getCatalogName, getColumnClassName, getColumnDisplaySize, getColumnLabel, getColumnName, getColumnType, getColumnTypeName, getPrecision, getScale, getSchemaName, getTableName, isAutoIncrement, isCaseSensitive, isCurrency, isDefinitelyWritable, isNullable, isReadOnly, isSearchable, isSigned, isWritable

    • Method Detail

      • getMaxContainingStringLength

        int getMaxContainingStringLength()
        Gets the maximum character length for a string value entry if this column is declared as a string typed one.
        Returns:
        Maximum character length

      • setMaxContainingStringLength

        void setMaxContainingStringLength(int length)
        Sets the maximum character length for a string value entry if this column is declared as a string typed one.

        Note: Please ensure that each string content you'll write into this column is shorter or equal to length. Otherwise the import of an entry will fail.
        Parameters:
        length - Maximum length
